properties.title: Rollsportpark Schüpfheim
properties.abstract: The roller sport park in Schüpfheim, which opened in 2019, is a meeting point for all ages in the Entlebuch region. The facility consists of three different large asphalt pump tracks. Another special feature is the Bowl, which is aimed at skaters in particular.
properties.description:
Whether it is bikes, kickboards, roller skates, skateboards or balance bikes: at the sports centre right next to Schüpfheim station, children, young people and adults can let off steam using all their roller sport equipment.

The facility consists of three asphalt pump tracks of different sizes, which are equipped with attractive bumps and banked curves. There is a circuit to suit every age and ability. While the little ones pedal around on their courses, advanced riders can leap from bump to bump on the large pump track. The bowl-shaped skating facility is designed specially for skateboards, inline skates and BMX. It is a good addition to the pump track, as you can use the Bowl like a half-pipe. 

Right next to the roller sport park is a service building with toilets, a hire area with bikes and scooters, and a kiosk with drinks and snacks.
properties.name: Rollsportpark Schüpfheim
